title: Point Reyes National Seashore: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education            Using Park Resources to Teach, Inspire and Motivate Students  Â    Ranger-led Education programs for the school year 2015-2016 are full. Please do not submit requests for programs. We had an overwhelmingly large response this year within the first hour reservations were open. Self-guided classes are welcome on Mondays and Fridays, and don't require a reservation. If you would like to receive a copy of the Kule Loklo DVD for your school, please call (415) 464-5139 and leave a message with your name, the school's name and address. Thank you.
